title: Highlight Current Node in SolrCloud graphical display
description:
When running in Cloud mode, we show a graphical picture of the current cluster in the URL http://localhost:8983/solr/#/~cloud

It'd be nice to visually indicate which of these nodes I'm currently on

In SOLR-4438 Stefan Matheis (steffkes) mentioned he thought this was a nice idea, but should be logged as a separate bug in JIRA.
